2.title: Riccardo Bianchini
2.content: I am a researcher in computer science who just finished a research fellow at DIBRIS, University of Genoa.

3.title: Research interests
3.content: My research interests are on the design of resource-aware programming languages. In particular, I am focused on the design of graded type systems and semantics.
